exclusion.criterion: Age under 12 or more than 70 years
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Multiple (> 3) large stone (> 1.5 cm) in head of pancreas or stones present throughout
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass with fevers/rigors and bandemia. CT abdomen showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma.
